text:
The Tremors franchise is a  monster movie series centering on the vicious attacks of subterranean worm-like creatures known as Graboids. It began in 1990 with the successful release of Tremors, which spawned five direct-to-video films; four sequels (Tremors 2: Aftershocks, Tremors 3: Back to Perfection, Tremors 5: Bloodlines, and Tremors: A Cold Day in Hell) and a prequel (Tremors 4: The Legend Begins).
In addition to the film series, Tremors: The Series, a television series that premiered on Syfy, was produced, only to be cancelled after 13 episodes.
